title: Microsoft Edge: In-browser JSON viewer
description:
Improvements to how JSON files are displayed in the browser, which includes a color-coded tree view with line numbers and the ability to collapse and expand the data.  This functionality will trigger automatically when the browser navigates to a JSON file on the web or the user opens a local one.  Additional features and enhancements will roll out as available.  For more information and to provide feedback visit.
More info: https://aka.ms/discuss-json-viewer
